audit_tests.name: Ensure that the --anonymous-auth argument is set to false (Manual)
audit_tests.description: Disable anonymous requests to the API server.
audit_tests.remediation:
Edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube- apiserver.yaml on the master node and set the below parameter.
--anonymous-auth=false
audit_tests.default_value: By default, anonymous access is enabled.

audit_tests.name: Ensure that the --basic-auth-file argument is not set (Automated)
audit_tests.remediation: Follow the documentation and configure alternate mechanisms for authentication. Then, edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube- apiserver.yaml on the master node and remove the --basic-auth-file=<filename> parameter.
audit_tests.impact: You will have to configure and use alternate authentication mechanisms such as tokens and certificates. Username and password for basic authentication could no longer be used.
audit_tests.default_value: By default, basic authentication is not set.

audit_tests.name: Ensure that the --token-auth-file parameter is not set (Automated)
audit_tests.description: Do not use token based authentication.
audit_tests.remediation: Follow the documentation and configure alternate mechanisms for authentication. Then, edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube- apiserver.yaml on the master node and remove the --token-auth-file=<filename> parameter.
audit_tests.impact: You will have to configure and use alternate authentication mechanisms such as certificates. Static token based authentication could not be used.
audit_tests.default_value: By default, --token-auth-file argument is not set.

audit_tests.name: Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true (Automated)
audit_tests.remediation: Follow the documentation and configure alternate mechanisms for authentication. Then, edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube- apiserver.yaml on the master node and remove the --token-auth-file=<filename> parameter.
audit_tests.impact: You require TLS to be configured on apiserver as well as kubelets.
audit_tests.default_value: By default, kubelet connections are over https.
